meta.title: HOME - Together We Can Move The Needle Of Diversity In Tech.

meta.name: description
meta.content: Code Differently provides the education that gives participants the cognitive and technical skills they need to excel in the tech industry.
HOME - Together We Can Move The Needle Of Diversity In Tech.
Code Differently provides the education that gives participants the cognitive and technical skills they need to excel in the tech industry.

div.class: wpb_row vc_row-fluid vc_row top-level full-width-content parallax_section

div.style: background-image: url(https://codedifferently.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/codedifferentlyheader.jpg); background-position: right top; background-repeat: no-repeat; background-color: #333333;

div.class: vc_col-sm-8 wpb_column column_container vc_column_container col no-extra-padding inherit_tablet no-extra-padding_phone

div.h1: Together we can move the needle of diversity in tech.

div.class: wpb_row vc_row-fluid vc_row inner_row standard_section vc_custom_1594307775335 right_padding_8pct reverse_columns_desktop reverse_columns_row_phone
vc_col-sm-10 wpb_column column_container vc_column_container col child_column has-animation no-extra-padding inherit_tablet padding-7-percent_phone

div.p: Code Differently provides hands on training and education through coding classes that gives participants the technical and cognitive skills they need to excel in technology-driven workplaces.

div.class: vc_col-sm-2 wpb_column column_container vc_column_container col child_column no-extra-padding inherit_tablet inherit_phone
vc_col-sm-4 wpb_column column_container vc_column_container col no-extra-padding inherit_tablet inherit_phone
vc_col-sm-12 wpb_column column_container vc_column_container col no-extra-padding inherit_tablet inherit_phone
wpb_row vc_row-fluid vc_row inner_row standard_section vc_custom_1594220905409
vc_col-sm-12 wpb_column column_container vc_column_container col child_column no-extra-padding inherit_tablet padding-2-percent_phone
wpb_row vc_row-fluid vc_row inner_row standard_section vc_custom_1603490481908
vc_col-sm-6 wpb_column column_container vc_column_container col child_column no-extra-padding inherit_tablet inherit_phone

p.span: The Code Differently 1000 Kids Coding program was created to expose New Castle County students to computing and programming. The 1000 Kids Coding courses are designed for all experience levels, no experience required.

div.class: vc_col-sm-6 wpb_column column_container vc_column_container col child_column no-extra-padding inherit_tablet inherit_phone

div.p: The Return Ready Workforce Training Initiative is funded by New Castle County CARES Grant to assist residents of New Castle County with returning to work with technology skills needed for today’s technology-driven workforce.

div.class: vc_col-sm-6 wpb_column column_container vc_column_container col child_column no-extra-padding inherit_tablet no-extra-padding_phone

div.p: Pipeline DevShop is a youth work-based learning program. Youth participants experience working in a real software development environment while sharpening their technology and soft skills.

div.class: vc_col-sm-6 wpb_column column_container vc_column_container col child_column no-extra-padding inherit_tablet inherit_phone

div.p: Platform programs are designed for high school graduates, college students, career changers, or professionals looking to develop the technology job readiness skills for today’s workforce.

div.class: vc_col-sm-12 wpb_column column_container vc_column_container col no-extra-padding inherit_tablet inherit_phone
wpb_row vc_row-fluid vc_row inner_row standard_section vc_custom_1594229491817
vc_col-sm-6 wpb_column column_container vc_column_container col child_column no-extra-padding inherit_tablet no-extra-padding_phone
vc_col-sm-6 wpb_column column_container vc_column_container col child_column no-extra-padding inherit_tablet inherit_phone
wpb_row vc_row-fluid vc_row inner_row vc_row-o-equal-height vc_row-flex standard_section
vc_col-sm-3 wpb_column column_container vc_column_container col child_column padding-5-percent inherit_tablet inherit_phone

div.div: of our high school participants will continue their education or career in technology related fields.

div.class: vc_col-sm-3 wpb_column column_container vc_column_container col child_column padding-5-percent inherit_tablet inherit_phone

div.div: of our college participants received offers for internships or full-time employment in technology organizations.

div.class: vc_col-sm-3 wpb_column column_container vc_column_container col child_column padding-5-percent inherit_tablet inherit_phone

div.div: of our program participants identify as ethnically underrepresented.

div.class: vc_col-sm-3 wpb_column column_container vc_column_container col child_column padding-5-percent inherit_tablet inherit_phone

div.div: of our participants identify as women.

div.class: wpb_row vc_row-fluid vc_row full-width-section vc_row-o-equal-height vc_row-flex vc_row-o-content-middle parallax_section
vc_col-sm-12 vc_col-xs-12 wpb_column column_container vc_column_container col padding-2-percent inherit_tablet inherit_phone
wpb_row vc_row-fluid vc_row inner_row vc_row-o-equal-height vc_row-flex vc_row-o-content-middle standard_section
vc_col-sm-6 wpb_column column_container vc_column_container col child_column no-extra-padding inherit_tablet inherit_phone

div.h2: We designed each program on the foundation of five strategic pillars:

div.class: vc_col-sm-6 wpb_column column_container vc_column_container col child_column no-extra-padding inherit_tablet inherit_phone

div.div: Attraction:We employ innovative initiatives to spark participants' curiosity about the tech industry.
Exposure:We expose participant to the amazing world of technology and coding.
Engagement:We keep participants engaged by fostering more in-depth learning of principles and concepts.
Ownership:We help participants develop a sense of ownership of their new skill set by providing opportunities for them to develop real technology solutions.
Empowerment:We empower participants to inspire others to explore tech careers.

div.class: vc_col-sm-12 wpb_column column_container vc_column_container col centered-text no-extra-padding inherit_tablet inherit_phone

div.h2: Strengthening the technology ecosystem by creating mutually beneficial relationships between communities and corporate partners.

div.class: vc_col-sm-12 wpb_column column_container vc_column_container col no-extra-padding inherit_tablet inherit_phone
vc_col-sm-12 wpb_column column_container vc_column_container col child_column no-extra-padding inherit_tablet inherit_phone
wpb_row vc_row-fluid vc_row inner_row vc_row-o-equal-height vc_row-flex standard_section
vc_col-sm-4 wpb_column column_container vc_column_container col child_column centered-text has-animation padding-3-percent inherit_tablet inherit_phone

div.p: Get access to diverse talent and create opportunities for those who need it most.

a.class: nectar-button medium regular-tilt extra-color-1 tilt regular-button

div.class: vc_col-sm-4 wpb_column column_container vc_column_container col child_column has-animation padding-3-percent inherit_tablet inherit_phone

div.p: Get the skills you need to be employable in any economy.

a.class: nectar-button medium regular-tilt extra-color-1 tilt regular-button

div.class: vc_col-sm-4 wpb_column column_container vc_column_container col child_column has-animation padding-3-percent inherit_tablet inherit_phone

div.p: You have the power to make an impact by donating your time and resources.

a.class: nectar-button medium regular-tilt extra-color-1 tilt regular-button

div.class: vc_col-sm-12 wpb_column column_container vc_column_container col no-extra-padding inherit_tablet inherit_phone
vc_col-sm-2 wpb_column column_container vc_column_container col child_column no-extra-padding inherit_tablet inherit_phone
vc_col-sm-8 wpb_column column_container vc_column_container col child_column no-extra-padding inherit_tablet inherit_phone

div.p: Below are some of the companies, schools and organizations that we're proud to have as our partners and sponsors.

div.class: vc_col-sm-2 wpb_column column_container vc_column_container col child_column no-extra-padding inherit_tablet inherit_phone

div.p:

Wilmington, DE 19801
302.317.3020
